articles.title: Coronavirus News LIVE Updates: India Logs in 39,742 Covid-19 Cases, 535 Deaths in the Last 24 hours - News18
articles.description: Coronavirus News LIVE Updates: India reported 39,742 new Covid cases, 39,972 recoveries, and 535 deaths in the last 24 hours.
articles.content: Coronavirus News LIVE Updates: India reported 39,742 new Covid cases, 39,972 recoveries, and 535 deaths in the last 24 hours. Covid-19 infections continued to rise rapidly in Kerala, with daily cases… [+1140 chars]
